main event: A bright, metallic, circular object with a dome on top was spotted in the sky over Mangham, Louisiana on May 22, 1960.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 1 hour, sometimes appearing brilliant and other times dull and hazy.
The object remained steady in the same general area and did not flicker or twinkle.
The object was not a weather balloon or weather-related object.
Two interceptor aircraft were sent from England AFB to try to intercept the object.
The object was also observed by the guard and search officer stationed at Barksdale AFB.
sighted object: Bright, metallic, circular object with a dome on top
witnesses: Major Brantley of the Air Force Command Post, other witnesses in the Mangham area
